downlooru.title: Downlooru
downlooru.desc: Bulk Download Application for Booru-Type Image-servers.

csflopapp.title: CSFlopApp
csflopapp.desc: Private Android Application that calculates complex mathematical operations in the Industrial Security Field.

csfhazapp.title: CSFHazApp
csfhazapp.desc: Private Android Application that calculates complex mathematical operations in the Industrial Security Field.

botbrico.title: Bot Brico Shop
botbrico.desc: A Bot for the Brico Shop made with MS Bot Framework

acuacar.title: Acuacar
acuacar.desc: An API system used to check water usage meters using an Online AI to determine many values associated with pictures taken by operators. Many controllers and a KPI system is included to further analize the results of water meter check either with a daily, weekly or monthly temporality.

smartgreen.title: SmartGreen
smartgreen.desc: Added support for the MQTT Communication Protocol, encoding data in Base64 from/to Hexadecimal to send messages to low-power devices that utilize the LoRa modulation technique through MQTT.

fira.title: Fira
fira.desc: A system dedicated to livestreamed e-commerce where clients can watch a product presentation, comment and purchase products live with an extensive list of payment methods.

OFTS.title: OFMS
OFTS.desc: On-Field Management System, is a system made to keep track and status of On-Field projects for a company. It has an empoyee portal where they can check their assigned projects, update and check other statuses and make special requests to the company while on On-Field duty.
